document.full_text: mike birbiglia's latest monologue starts with a traumatic event ' in this case, a car accident ' and wraps it in nutty anecdotes and meandering detours but somehow never loses the audience or the arc.
document.title: theater review: stomach-churning date in love life full of bumps
lines_and_colors: mike birbiglia's latest monologue starts with a traumatic event ' in this case, a car accident ' and wraps it in nutty anecdotes and meandering detours but somehow never loses the audience or the arc.
